content.data:
[Y]Monitor Choices
[W]Green screen discipline or full colour
[W]punch.
[c][m.]
[W]The green monitor made text razor
[W]sharp and coding sessions easy on
[W]tired eyes.
[W]Colour display gave games their full
[W]personality with bright pen
[W]combinations.
[c][m.]
[G]- Green for clarity.
[G]- Colour for games.
[G]- RF TV for convenience.
[m][m-]
[Y]TIP
[C]Test both text and sprites before
[C]choosing your setup.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
